sqlMap.select:
SELECT PRODUCT_ID productId , PRODUCT_NAME productName , CONCAT('http://www.marpple.com', FILE_PATH) filePath , HOT hot , BEST best FROM PRODUCT WHERE USE_YN = 'Y'
AND CATALOG = #catalog#
AND CATEGORY = #category#

SELECT PRODUCT_ID productId , PRODUCT_NAME productName , CONCAT('http://www.marpple.com', SIZE_FILE_PATH) sizeFilePath , SIZE_FILE_NAME sizeFileName , DESCRIPTION description FROM PRODUCT WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND PRODUCT_ID = #productId#

SELECT A.FILE_TYPE fileType , B.SIZE size , A.LOC_TOP locTop , A.LOC_LEFT locLeft , A.LOC_WIDTH locWidth , A.LOC_HEIGHT locHeight , C.CODE_VALUE sizeName , A.PRODUCT_ID productId FROM PRODUCT_TYPE A, PRODUCT_SIZE B, COMMON_CODE C WHERE A.PRODUCT_ID = B.PRODUCT_ID AND A.PRODUCT_ID = #productId#
A.FILE_TYPE = #fileType#
AND C.CODE_CLASS = 'SIZE' AND B.SIZE = C.CODE_KEY ORDER BY A.FILE_TYPE, B.SIZE
SELECT COLOR color FROM PRODUCT_COLOR WHERE PRODUCT_ID = #productId# ORDER BY COLOR
SELECT FILE_TYPE fileType FROM PRODUCT_TYPE WHERE PRODUCT_ID = #productId#
SELECT SIZE size FROM PRODUCT_SIZE WHERE PRODUCT_ID = #productId# ORDER BY SIZE

SELECT TYPE type , FILE_TYPE fileType , LOC_TOP locTop , LOC_LEFT locLeft , LOC_WIDTH locWidth , LOC_HEIGHT locHeight , PRICE price , CASE ONLY_VECTOR WHEN 'N' THEN 'false' WHEN 'Y' THEN 'true' END onlyVector , CONCAT('http://www.marpple.com', FILE_PATH) filePath , FILE_NAME fileName , SORT sort FROM PRODUCT_TYPE WHERE PRODUCT_ID = #productId# ORDER BY SORT

SELECT FILE_TYPE type , COLOR color , CONCAT('http://www.marpple.com', FILE_PATH) filePath , FILE_NAME fileName , SORT sort FROM PRODUCT_TYPE A, PRODUCT_COLOR B WHERE A.PRODUCT_ID = B.PRODUCT_ID AND A.PRODUCT_ID = #productId#

SELECT COLOR color , SIZE size , PRICE price , B.EXTRA_PRICE extraPrice , CODE_VALUE colorName FROM PRODUCT_SIZE A, PRODUCT_COLOR B, COMMON_CODE C WHERE A.PRODUCT_ID = B.PRODUCT_ID AND A.PRODUCT_ID = #productId#
B.COLOR = #color#
AND B.COLOR = C.CODE_KEY AND C.CODE_CLASS = 'COLOR' ORDER BY COLOR, SIZE
